title: Embroidered Picture, 1962-52-34, 17th century
medium:
Medium: linen, silk, metallic thread
Technique: embroidered
creditline: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: Fragment of an embroidered picture. Linen solidly worked with polychrome silk and gold thread with floral motifs, stag and a lion.
